attributes.background: There has been many discovery's in science, from proving that gender should be on a spectrum from the discovery of the SRY gene in 1990(Source 1) to extra chromosomes (Source 2). If we do believe in equality then we should make this change.  I go in detail on my reddit page linked below w/ sources.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly how you would like the definition of gender to be changed.
